title: React Training - Startup that teaches React...oh and they build React Router too
categories: These guys built a router for react, and then they go around teaching about react for mad money. I think that's pretty sweet.
author: Skrillex

title: A minute of secondhand marijuana smoke may damage blood vessels
categories: I suppose that this could be possible in humans.  But when I hear 'these temporary problems can turn into long-term problems if exposures occur often enough and may increase the chances of developing hardened and clogged arteries' I start to think that this might be more of a risk for overweight people, which we already knew.  Hard to say though when their only evidence is in rats.
author: Skrillex
